text: Do not address an older man harshly but appeal to him as a father. Speak to younger men as brothers,
older women as mothers, and younger women as sisters—with complete purity.
Honor widows who are truly in need.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> a <st data-num="5503" class="">widow</st> has <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1549" class="">grandchildren</st>, they should <st data-num="4413">first</st> <st data-num="3129" class="">learn</st> to <st data-num="2151" class="">fulfill</st> their <st data-num="2151" class="">duty</st><n id="1" /> toward <st data-num="2398" class="">their own</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">household</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> so <st data-num="591">repay</st> their <st data-num="4269" class="">parents</st> what is owed them.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> what <st data-num="587" class="">pleases</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="5503" class="">widow</st> who is <st data-num="3689" class="">truly</st> in need, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3443">completely on</st> her <st data-num="3443">own</st>,<n id="1" /> has <st data-num="1679">set</st> her <st data-num="1679" class="">hope</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4357" class="">continues</st> in her <st data-num="1162" class="">pleas</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4335" class="">prayers</st> <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the one who <st data-num="4684" class="">lives for pleasure</st> is <st data-num="2348" class="">dead</st> even<n id="1" /> while she <st data-num="2198" class="">lives</st>.

<st data-num="3853" class="">Reinforce</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="3853" class="">commands</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> they will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="423">beyond reproach</st>.
But if someone does not provide for his own, especially his own family, he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever.
No widow should be put on the list unless she is at least sixty years old, was the wife of one husband,

and has a <st data-num="3140" class="">reputation</st> <st data-num="1722">for</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works:</st> <st data-num="1487">as</st> one who has <st data-num="5044" class="">raised children</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3580" class="">practiced hospitality</st>, <st data-num="3538" class="">washed</st> the <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> of the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st>, <st data-num="1884" class="">helped</st> those <st data-num="2346">in distress</st>—as one who has <st data-num="1872" class="">exhibited</st> <st data-num="3956">all kinds</st> of <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> do not <st data-num="3868" class="">accept</st> <st data-num="3501" class="">younger</st> <st data-num="5503" class="">widows</st> on the list,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> their <st data-num="2691" class="">passions may lead</st> them <st data-num="2691" class="">away</st> from <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="2" /> and they will <st data-num="2309" class="">desire</st> to <st data-num="1060" class="">marry</st>,

and so <st data-num="2192" class="">incur</st> <st data-num="2917" class="">judgment</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">for</st> <st data-num="114" class="">breaking</st> their <st data-num="4413" class="">former</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">pledge</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="260 2532">besides that</st>, <st data-num="4022" class="">going around</st><n id="1" /> from <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> to <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> they <st data-num="3129" class="">learn</st> to be <st data-num="692" class="">lazy</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161">and</st> they are <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="3441">only</st> <st data-num="692" class="">lazy</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="5397" class="">gossips</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4021" class="">busybodies</st>, <st data-num="2980" class="">talking</st> about <st data-num="3588">things</st> they <st data-num="1163" class="">should</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> I <st data-num="1014" class="">want</st> <st data-num="3501">younger women</st> to <st data-num="1060" class="">marry</st>, <st data-num="5041" class="">raise children</st>, and <st data-num="3616" class="">manage a household</st>, in order to <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> the <st data-num="480" class="">adversary</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">no</st> <st data-num="874" class="">opportunity</st> <st data-num="5484">to</st> <st data-num="3059" class="">vilify</st> us.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> have <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="1624">wandered away</st> to <st data-num="3694" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st>.<n id="1" />
If a believing woman has widows in her family, let her help them. The church should not be burdened so that it may help the widows who are truly in need.
Elders who provide effective leadership must be counted worthy of double honor, especially those who work hard in speaking and teaching.
For the scripture says, “Do not muzzle an ox while it is treading out the grain,” and, “The worker deserves his pay.”
Do not accept an accusation against an elder unless it can be confirmed by two or three witnesses.

Those <st data-num="264">guilty of sin</st><n id="1" /> must be <st data-num="1651" class="">rebuked</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>,<n id="3" /> as a <st data-num="5401">warning</st> to the <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1799" class="">Before</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1588" class="">elect</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st>, I <st data-num="1263">solemnly charge</st> you <st data-num="2443">to</st> <st data-num="5442">carry out</st> <st data-num="3778">these commands</st> <st data-num="5565" class="">without</st> <st data-num="4299" class="">prejudice</st> <st data-num="3367">or</st> <st data-num="4346" class="">favoritism</st> of any kind.<n id="1" />

Do <st data-num="3367" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2007" class="">lay</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="2007" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">anyone</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5030" class="">hastily</st> <st data-num="3366">and so</st> <st data-num="2841" class="">identify</st> with the <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> of <st data-num="245" class="">others</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5083" class="">Keep</st> <st data-num="4572" class="">yourself</st> <st data-num="53" class="">pure</st>.

(<st data-num="3371" class="">Stop</st> <st data-num="5202" class="">drinking</st> just <st data-num="5202" class="">water</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="5530" class="">use</st> a <st data-num="3641" class="">little</st> <st data-num="3631" class="">wine</st> <st data-num="1223">for</st> your <st data-num="4751">digestion</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4437" class="">frequent</st> <st data-num="769">illnesses</st>.)<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> of <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4271" class="">obvious</st>, <st data-num="4254">going before</st> them <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> for <st data-num="5100" class="">others</st>, they <st data-num="1872">show up later</st>.<n id="1" />
Similarly good works are also obvious, and the ones that are not cannot remain hidden.
